title: List of New York Jets seasons
text:
This is a list of seasons completed by the <a href="New%20York%20Jets">New York Jets</a>. The Jets, formerly known as the New York Titans, are an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="Professional%20sports%20league%20organization">franchise</a> that competes as a member club in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> (NFL). The list documents the season-by-season records of the Jets' franchise from <a href="1960%20in%20sports">1960</a> to the present, including postseason records and league awards for individual players or head coaches. The Titans were a part of the inaugural season of the <a href="American%20Football%20League">American Football League</a> (AFL) in 1960. In 1963, the Titans changed their name to the Jets after a change in ownership.
The New York Jets have won one <a href="History%20of%20NFL%20Championships">National Football League championship</a> in <a href="Super%20Bowl%20III">Super Bowl III</a>. In their 60-season history, they have an overall regular season record of 408 wins, 500 losses, and 8 ties. They have made 14 postseason appearances, and have an overall postseason record of 12 wins and 13 losses.
Seasons.
"Note: Statistics are correct through the end of the <a href="2021%20NFL%20season">2021 NFL season</a>."
